participant_1.background:
I love going on long bike rides in the woods, but I don't tell my parents because they worry about me getting hurt.
i have been married five times.
i escaped and later became a carpenter.
sometimes i go to yoga classes.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

participant_2.background:
I'm an active person who enjoys working with my hands and spending time outdoors.
I love to take weekend trips to explore new places and write about my experiences.
i like collecting rocks.
I love to sing karaoke and get my heart rate up with archery.
I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade.

content.text: Hey! I love going on long bike rides in the woods. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I love that too! I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
I know, right? It's the best way to clear your head.
Exactly! I also love taking weekend trips to explore new places. I'm always looking for new adventures.
Me too! I love getting out and seeing new things. It's so much fun to explore different cultures and meet new people.
I know, right? It's the best way to learn about the world.
I'm also an active person who enjoys working with my hands. I love building things and fixing things.
I love that too! I love the feeling of accomplishment when you finish a project.
Me too! It's so satisfying to see something you've created come to life.
Exactly! I also love spending time outdoors. I love hiking, camping, and fishing.
Me too! I love the fresh air and the beautiful scenery.
Exactly! It's the best way to relax and de-stress.
I agree! I'm so glad we have so much in common.
